name: Zen Card Match
description:
Zen Card Match is a simple yet fun card match memory game. With two gameplay modes, you can take your time and match all of the images, or if you're feeling like a challenge go against the timer and try to match the cards before time runs out!

FEATURES:

* ZEN MODE: A casual mode designed to test your memory, but at your own pace.

* CHALLENGE MODE: Race against the clock in order to find all of the matches!

* CARD THEMES: Animals, Sports, Food, Fruits, and more!

* HIGH SCORES: Zen Card Match saves your best time and lowest number of moves. Beat your own time, or let a friend play and see if they can beat yours!
